name: Valorant wiki
description: To practice my skills, I have decided to create an informative page about Valorant, one of my favorite games. I am using the endpoints provided by the Riot public API. Initially, my main goal was to practice, but now I continue development with the goal of expanding it and turning it into a product that can help players. The page is still a work in progress, but I'm excited about its potential to help the gaming community.

name: Wedding card
description: I created an interactive wedding invitation that was tailored to the client's design preferences, resulting in a final product that met the goal. Through a collaborative process, I closely engaged with clients to gain a comprehensive understanding of their vision for the invitation.

name: Differential equations
description: I developed a laboratory of two real world problems, solved and explained by means of differential equations in a graphic and understandable way.

name: Movies page
description: To get hands-on experience working with and managing APIs, I've created a page on functional movie information which uses an API to retrieve and display information for each movie. This hands-on project allowed me to understand the process of consuming external data and its effective integration into a web application.
